column4: When I insert my 16Gb flash drive, it doesn't automount.  How do I mount it, or find out the /dev entry?
then use the proper mount command.
OK to repost a question that I asked just before you logged in?
I upgraded from 10.04 to 10.10.  There is a box, "Error authenticating some packages" with 1630 entries.  Is this troublesome and how can I fix it?
i would have to think some gpg keys or other  keyfiles are missing.  soundsa like every package is  having the same issue.
i always do clean installs.. i rarely upgrade
That would  be my preference too.  But how can I keep from reformatting the hard drive?
i keep /home/ on its own partition. i dont loose user data that way. Makes reinstalling easier.
YOu do have backups of imporntant stuff?
I have backups of what I'm currently working on.  But there's a possibility that I'll have a head-slapper.
try making a new user see if the desktop works normally for them.
if it does then you may wangt to reset unity for the problem user
